name: Sign Up List
description: A MEAN port of the Sign Up List tool originally written by Malcolm Murray and Stephen Vickers.

lti_key.description: add your LTI Key - this is used by your consumer to access this application

lti_secret.description: add your LTI Secret - this is used by your consumer to access this application

app_oauth_key.description: Paste the OAUTH KEY provided when you registered your Application

app_oauth_secret.description: Paste the OAUTH SECRET provided when you registered your Application

app_target_url.description: Enter the target URL for your Application. E.g.: learn.myschool.edu. Do NOT include the protocol (http:// or https://). Provide port if required.

mongo_uri.description: Enter the target URI for your MongoDB. E.g.: ds145039.mlab.com:45039/signuplistdb -u <dbuser> -p <dbpassword>
